title: Champions like Sion
body: I really enjoy his playstyle of shoving lane and then teleporting somewhere and ulting into the enemy team. Any ideas?

replies.body:
Similar Champs which are tanky:
Malphite, Hecarim, Gnar, Maokai, Galio, Gragas, Jarvan, Nautilus, Olaf, Poppy, Rek'Sai, Sejuani, Shyvana, Zac, Leona, Skarner

Similar Champs which are more damage-oriented: 
Aatrox, Ekko, Fizz, Irelia, Kassadin, Kennen, Lissandra, Pantheon, Riven, Renekton, Rumble, Vlad, Wukong, Xin.

Some Champs are more fitting for top than others (I don't recommend Skarner, Zac, Leona, etc. top), but these are Champs which are similar to Sion.
{{champion:85}} as a non tank example that does what you want.
Malphite {{champion:54}} , Garen {{champion:86}} , Shyvanna {{champion:102}} , Jarvan {{champion:59}} and Olaf {{champion:2}} maybe?
